title: One Bedroom Available Today!!!
posting_body: Stop by to see your newly renovated home!
Metro Six55 is ideal for those desiring to live within the heart of the San Francisco Bay Area!
We are conveniently located within walking distance to the South Hayward Bart Station.
We are minutes away from downtown Hayward.
Our community is surrounded by mature redwood trees and is walking distance to several parks.
We have great amenities including a WIFI Lounge with a view of our sparkling pool/spa.
Our apartment homes have stainless steel appliances and hardwood flooring with walk in closets and tons of extra storage.
Call today to see your new home!
*Self Guided Tours Are Available By Appointments
Prices Are Subject To Change Daily
